title: LF Top & Support for NZGC Qualifier
body: Looking for a top and support player for NZGC qualifier this weekend ( https://battlefy.com/new-zealand-gaming-championship/nzgc-lol-major-qualifier/57638573cc4e702f0cda7245/info ). Gold 5 Minimum rank.

replies.body:
Hello, I am a support main and have been since season 4, I am skillful in support, I have good map awareness, and I am good to work with as a team player, Currently I have 2 accounts in silver, (I know this may be a put off but if you play with me a few games, you'll see i'm not that shabby) So if you give me a chance, and play a few games with me, i'd like to express myself :D (Watch this first)(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ngPmc8EH7ms) <--- me btw
- Supp or Feed
